verses.verse: Therefore thou shalt love<WH157> <WH853> the LORD<WH3068> thy God,<WH430> and keep<WH8104> his charge,<WH4931> and his statutes,<WH2708> and his judgments,<WH4941> and his commandments,<WH4687> always.<WH3605> <WH3117>

And know<WH3045> ye this day:<WH3117> for<WH3588> I speak not<WH3808> with<WH854> your children<WH1121> which<WH834> have not<WH3808> known,<WH3045> and which<WH834> have not<WH3808> seen<WH7200> <WH853> the chastisement<WH4148> of the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> <WH853> his greatness,<WH1433> <WH853> his mighty<WH2389> hand,<WH3027> and his stretched out<WH5186> arm,<WH2220>

And his miracles,<WH226> and his acts,<WH4639> which<WH834> he did<WH6213> in the midst<WH8432> of Egypt<WH4714> unto Pharaoh<WH6547> the king<WH4428> of Egypt,<WH4714> and unto all<WH3605> his land;<WH776>

And what<WH834> he did<WH6213> unto the army<WH2428> of Egypt,<WH4714> unto their horses,<WH5483> and to their chariots;<WH7393> how<WH834> he made<WH853> the water<WH4325> of the Red<WH5488> sea<WH3220> to overflow<WH6687> <WH5921> <WH6440> them as they pursued<WH7291> after<WH310> you, and how the LORD<WH3068> hath destroyed<WH6> them unto<WH5704> this<WH2088> day;<WH3117>
And what<WH834> he did<WH6213> unto you in the wilderness,<WH4057> until<WH5704> ye came<WH935> into<WH5704> this<WH2088> place;<WH4725>

And what<WH834> he did<WH6213> unto Dathan<WH1885> and Abiram,<WH48> the sons<WH1121> of Eliab,<WH446> the son<WH1121> of Reuben:<WH7205> how<WH834> the earth<WH776> opened<WH6475> <WH853> her mouth,<WH6310> and swallowed them up,<WH1104> and their households,<WH1004> and their tents,<WH168> and all<WH3605> the substance<WH3351> that<WH834> was in their possession,<WH7272> in the midst<WH7130> of all<WH3605> Israel: <WH3478>
But <WH3588> your eyes<WH5869> have seen<WH7200> <WH853> all<WH3605> the great<WH1419> acts<WH4639> of the LORD<WH3068> which<WH834> he did.<WH6213>

Therefore shall ye keep<WH8104> <WH853> all<WH3605> the commandments<WH4687> which<WH834> I<WH595> command<WH6680> you this day,<WH3117> that<WH4616> ye may be strong,<WH2388> and go in<WH935> and possess<WH3423> <WH853> the land,<WH776> whither<WH834> <WH8033> ye<WH859> go<WH5674> to possess<WH3423> it;

And that<WH4616> ye may prolong<WH748> your days<WH3117> in<WH5921> the land,<WH127> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> swore<WH7650> unto your fathers<WH1> to give<WH5414> unto them and to their seed,<WH2233> a land<WH776> that floweth<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey.<WH1706>

For <WH3588> the land,<WH776> whither<WH834> <WH8033> thou<WH859> goest in<WH935> to possess<WH3423> it, is not<WH3808> as the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> from whence<WH834> <WH4480> <WH8033> ye came out,<WH3318> where<WH834> thou sowedst<WH2232> <WH853> thy seed,<WH2233> and wateredst<WH8248> it with thy foot,<WH7272> as a garden<WH1588> of herbs: <WH3419>

But the land,<WH776> whither<WH834> <WH8033> ye<WH859> go<WH5674> to possess<WH3423> it, is a land<WH776> of hills<WH2022> and valleys,<WH1237> and drinketh<WH8354> water<WH4325> of the rain<WH4306> of heaven: <WH8064>

A land<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> careth<WH1875> for the eyes<WH5869> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> are always<WH8548> upon it, from the beginning<WH4480> <WH7225> of the year<WH8141> even unto<WH5704> the end<WH319> of the year.<WH8141>

And it shall come to pass,<WH1961> if<WH518> ye shall hearken diligently<WH8085> <WH8085> unto<WH413> my commandments<WH4687> which<WH834> I<WH595> command<WH6680> you this day,<WH3117> to love<WH157> <WH853> the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> and to serve<WH5647> him with all<WH3605> your heart<WH3824> and with all<WH3605> your soul,<WH5315>

That I will give<WH5414> you the rain<WH4306> of your land<WH776> in his due season,<WH6256> the first rain<WH3138> and the latter rain,<WH4456> that thou mayest gather in<WH622> thy corn,<WH1715> and thy wine,<WH8492> and thine oil.<WH3323>
And I will send<WH5414> grass<WH6212> in thy fields<WH7704> for thy cattle,<WH929> that thou mayest eat<WH398> and be full.<WH7646>
Take heed<WH8104> to yourselves, that<WH6435> your heart<WH3824> be not deceived,<WH6601> and ye turn aside,<WH5493> and serve<WH5647> other<WH312> gods,<WH430> and worship<WH7812> them;

And then the LORD's<WH3068> wrath<WH639> be kindled<WH2734> against you, and he shut up<WH6113> <WH853> the heaven,<WH8064> that there be<WH1961> no<WH3808> rain,<WH4306> and that the land<WH127> yield<WH5414> not<WH3808> <WH853> her fruit;<WH2981> and lest ye perish<WH6> quickly<WH4120> from off<WH4480> <WH5921> the good<WH2896> land<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> giveth<WH5414> you.

Therefore shall ye lay up<WH7760> <WH853> these<WH428> my words<WH1697> in<WH5921> your heart<WH3824> and in<WH5921> your soul,<WH5315> and bind<WH7194> them for a sign<WH226> upon<WH5921> your hand,<WH3027> that they may be<WH1961> as frontlets<WH2903> between<WH996> your eyes.<WH5869>

And ye shall teach<WH3925> them<WH853> your children,<WH1121> speaking<WH1696> of them when thou sittest<WH3427> in thine house,<WH1004> and when thou walkest<WH1980> by the way,<WH1870> when thou liest down,<WH7901> and when thou risest up.<WH6965>
And thou shalt write<WH3789> them upon<WH5921> the door posts<WH4201> of thine house,<WH1004> and upon thy gates: <WH8179>

That <WH4616> your days<WH3117> may be multiplied,<WH7235> and the days<WH3117> of your children,<WH1121> in<WH5921> the land<WH127> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> swore<WH7650> unto your fathers<WH1> to give<WH5414> them, as the days<WH3117> of heaven<WH8064> upon<WH5921> the earth.<WH776>

For <WH3588> if<WH518> ye shall diligently keep<WH8104> <WH8104> <WH853> all<WH3605> these<WH2063> commandments<WH4687> which<WH834> I<WH595> command<WH6680> you, to do<WH6213> them, to love<WH157> <WH853> the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> to walk<WH1980> in all<WH3605> his ways,<WH1870> and to cleave<WH1692> unto him;

Then will the LORD<WH3068> drive out<WH3423> <WH853> all<WH3605> these<WH428> nations<WH1471> from before<WH4480> <WH6440> you, and ye shall possess<WH3423> greater<WH1419> nations<WH1471> and mightier<WH6099> than<WH4480> yourselves.

Every <WH3605> place<WH4725> whereon<WH834> the soles<WH3709> of your feet<WH7272> shall tread<WH1869> shall be<WH1961> yours: from<WH4480> the wilderness<WH4057> and Lebanon,<WH3844> from<WH4480> the river,<WH5104> the river<WH5104> Euphrates,<WH6578> even unto<WH5704> the uttermost<WH314> sea<WH3220> shall your coast<WH1366> be.<WH1961>

There shall no<WH3808> man<WH376> be able to stand<WH3320> before<WH6440> you: for the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> shall lay<WH5414> the fear<WH6343> of you and the dread<WH4172> of you upon<WH5921> <WH6440> all<WH3605> the land<WH776> that<WH834> ye shall tread<WH1869> upon, as<WH834> he hath said<WH1696> unto you.
Behold, <WH7200> I<WH595> set<WH5414> before<WH6440> you this day<WH3117> a blessing<WH1293> and a curse;<WH7045>
<WH853> A blessing,<WH1293> if<WH834> ye obey<WH8085> <WH413> the commandments<WH4687> of the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> which<WH834> I<WH595> command<WH6680> you this day: <WH3117>

And a curse,<WH7045> if<WH518> ye will not<WH3808> obey<WH8085> <WH413> the commandments<WH4687> of the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> but turn aside<WH5493> out of<WH4480> the way<WH1870> which<WH834> I<WH595> command<WH6680> you this day,<WH3117> to go<WH1980> after<WH310> other<WH312> gods,<WH430> which<WH834> ye have not<WH3808> known.<WH3045>

And it shall come to pass,<WH1961> when<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath brought thee in<WH935> unto<WH413> the land<WH776> whither<WH834> <WH8033> thou<WH859> goest<WH935> to possess<WH3423> it, that thou shalt put<WH5414> <WH853> the blessing<WH1293> upon<WH5921> mount<WH2022> Gerizim,<WH1630> and the curse<WH7045> upon<WH5921> mount<WH2022> Ebal.<WH5858>

Are they<WH1992> not<WH3808> on the other side<WH5676> Jordan,<WH3383> by<WH310> the way<WH1870> where the sun<WH8121> goeth down,<WH3996> in the land<WH776> of the Canaanites,<WH3669> which dwell<WH3427> in the champaign<WH6160> over against<WH4136> Gilgal,<WH1537> beside<WH681> the plains<WH436> of Moreh?<WH4176>

For <WH3588> ye<WH859> shall pass over<WH5674> <WH853> Jordan<WH3383> to go in<WH935> to possess<WH3423> <WH853> the land<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> you, and ye shall possess<WH3423> it, and dwell<WH3427> therein.
And ye shall observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213> <WH853> all<WH3605> the statutes<WH2706> and judgments<WH4941> which<WH834> I<WH595> set<WH5414> before<WH6440> you this day.<WH3117>
